Uses of Interface
com.bigdata.io.IBufferAccess

  • Packages that use IBufferAccess 
    Package Description
    com.bigdata.io  
    com.bigdata.io.writecache
    Low-level write cache service.
    com.bigdata.journal
    The journal is an append-only persistence capable data structure supporting atomic commit, named indices, and transactions.
    com.bigdata.rwstore
